comments.raw_text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; Q312461; Hotbar 4.1.2.0; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 1.0.3705; InfoPath.1) Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.12) Gecko/20050915 Test URI will instead of going to Servlet again displays html as is on the browser. Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1.Write a Java servlet to construct an html like above 2. the idea is to get back to the same servlet again with IMG SRC URI 3. receive the tag again and process and display images Expected Results: displays html on browser It should follow the URI
Front
Back

comments.author: vseerror@lehigh.edu
comments.text:
do you still see this problem when using firefox version 3.5 or 3.6?
If not, please close the bug (resolution WORKSFORME is one possibility).
And if you do see the problem, please provide an update comment.

comments.author: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.creator: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: No reply, INCOMPLETE. Please retest with Firefox 3.6.x or later and a new profile (http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Managing+profiles). If you continue to see this issue with the newest firefox and a new profile, then please comment on this bug.
comments.text: No reply, INCOMPLETE. Please retest with Firefox 3.6.x or later and a new profile (http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Managing+profiles). If you continue to see this issue with the newest firefox and a new profile, then please comment on this bug.
